mapper.insert: insert into yl_guarantee (id, person_id, pay_cost, data_zip, card, remark, application_time, status) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{personId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{payCost,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{dataZip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{card,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{applicationTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT})
mapper.update: update yl_guarantee set person_id = #{personId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, pay_cost = #{payCost,jdbcType=TINYINT}, data_zip = #{dataZip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, card = #{card,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, application_time = #{applicationTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, person_id, pay_cost, data_zip, card, application_time, remark, status from yl_guarantee

select y.id, x.name, x.identity, y.person_id, y.pay_cost, y.data_zip, y.card, y.application_time, y.remark, y.status from yl_guarantee y JOIN xjhb_person x WHERE y.person_id = x.id and x.name like #{name} and y.status = 1
